long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See the total number of search results on Google at a glance. 

Googleâ€™s latest design changes hide this information behind a dropdown, but this extension restores it to the top of your search page for quick access. Simple and straightforward, it makes finding result counts easier.

You can instantly see the "About X results" value at the top of your search results without extra clicks.

Google Search Results Number is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to automatically extract and display precise search result statistics in a more convenient location on Google search pages.

Key Features

* Instantly reveals the total number of search results
* Automatically relocates result statistics
* Works seamlessly with Google search results
* Minimal performance impact
* No user interaction required
